title: Skin unlocked in lobby, yet unable to select it.
body:
Had a skin show as unlocked in lobby, yet when I tried to select it...it came up as locked.

Posted photo.

replies.body:
Hey Mr Kaffeine - 

If you go to your profile and click on Nunu, does it show that you own this particular skin? If so, I'd suggest a client restart (obviously not when in game). If you don't own the skin, thaaaat's an entirely different issue on our end that we can look into!
